Posts.EditableText:
hey everyone,

Is it possible to sell the games that we create with the quest program? I assume I would need to purchase the quest Pro edition? Is it possible to make it where people can play the games that I create with out the quest program?

I assume all this falls with in the category of getting a customized version of the quest program?

Also is there any licensing that needs to be done regarding making commercial games? A couple of weeks ago I sent a e-mail through the website on the contact us page, and I have yet to get a reply. I assume the company never got it.

Thank you for your time,

Bigk

Posts.EditableText: Yes you can sell games created with Quest, but you would need to get your players to download Quest from this website - obviously not ideal. However if you have a custom build, you can integrate your game into one setup file. The Quest player can be rebranded, so your game will appear as one stand-alone application. More details on custom builds are here: http://www.axeuk.com/quest/custom.htm
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: Yes, that would be possible in a custom build - if you drop me an email to alex@axeuk.com with your requirements, I can get back to you with costs and timescales etc. Sorry I didn't spot your post ealier elexxorine, but how do you mean licencing it out? Yes a custom build could be created for QuestNet games - I presume you mean a custom client (front end)?
